title: /help
description: A short explanation of Pigeon's commands. Use /help [command] for more information on a given command.

fields.name: /addgroup [groupname] [channelid] (+[description] optional)
fields.value: > Initialise a new QOTD group with a name, description and the ID of the channel in which the questions should be posted.

fields.name: /setrole [groupname] [roleid]
fields.value: > Set the QOTD role which will be pinged daily when the question is posted.

fields.name: /addq [question] [groupname]
fields.value: > Add a question to the given group. If you don't know the groupname, use the command /allgroups to see all the groups in the current server.

fields.name: /removeq [questionnr] [groupname]
fields.value: > Remove the question with the given number. To see all the questions and their numbers, use /allq [groupname].

fields.name: /allq [groupname]
fields.value: > Show ALL current saved questions of the given group.

fields.name: /reset [groupname]
fields.value: > Reset the 'answered' questions, moving all the questions already asked back to the pool of questions.

fields.name: /removegroup [groupname]
fields.value:
> Remove a QOTD group and all its questions.
> If you want to edit a group without removing it, contact the bot admins as there is currently no editing functionality.

fields.name: /qotd [groupname]
fields.value: > Get a random question from the given group. If you don't know the groupname, use the command /allgroups to see all the groups in the current server.*

footer.text: Use /help [command] to get more info about a specific command!
